main event: A round, white object making a strange, loud noise was sighted in Italy on September 14, 1954. The object came to a standstill and then disappeared at high speed.
interesting points: The object was round and white in appearance.
The object made a strange, loud noise.
The object came to a complete standstill before disappearing at high speed.
Two inhabitants of Pitigliano reported the sighting.
The sighting was evaluated by ATIC as 'UNKNOWN - insufficient data'.
